trans-unit.source: Contains an event task that is defined in an event provider.
trans-unit.target: 包含的事件提供程序中定义一个事件任务。

trans-unit.source: The task identifies a portion of an application or a component that publishes an event.
trans-unit.target: 任务标识应用程序或发布事件的组件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A task is a 16-bit value with 16 top values reserved.
trans-unit.target: 任务是具有保留的前 16 个值的 16 位值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.ProviderMetadata> object defies a list of EventTask objects, one for each task defined in the provider.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.ProviderMetadata>对象分别 EventTask 对象，一个用于定义提供程序中每个任务的列表。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.ProviderMetadata>

trans-unit.source: The standard task values and their meanings are defined in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 在中定义的标准任务值以及它们的含义<xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel>枚举。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel>

trans-unit.source: Gets the localized name for the event task.
trans-unit.target: 获取事件任务的本地化的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the localized name for the event task.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含事件任务的本地化的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the event globally unique identifier (GUID) associated with the task.
trans-unit.target: 获取与任务关联的事件全局唯一标识符 (GUID)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the non-localized name of the event task.
trans-unit.target: 获取事件任务的非本地化名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the non-localized name of the event task.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含事件任务的非本地化名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the numeric value associated with the task.
trans-unit.target: 获取与任务关联的数字值。
